Posts.Content: Thanks so much...just what I wanted to hear! No I'm not competitive at all, same as you really. Some people seem to have no problems and others seem to have a lot of problems. Hope the recovery continues to go well for you. I might be brave enough to have the LD recon now!
Posts.Title: Advice on reconstruction

Posts.Content: Hi, has anyone had latissimus dorsi reconstruction who is quite sporty? I am worried I won't be able to do all the activities (like cycling, yoga) that I do now. I would really appreciate anyone with experience letting me know what they think! Thanks!
Posts.Title: Advice on reconstruction

Posts.Content: Thank you...I will call them tomorrow, best wishes Helen
Posts.Title: Advice on reconstruction

Posts.Content: Thanks very much! It's great to know this. Everyone has been positive about this operation and it has really helped me to get people's opinions, so thanks again! Helen
Posts.Title: Advice on reconstruction
